pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sampling from Order Statistics of New Families of Distributions // Set of tools to generate samples of order statistics from new families of distributions. The main references for this package are: Gentle, J. (2009), Computational Statistics, Springer-Verlag and Naradajah, S. and Rocha, R. (2016), Newdistns: An R Package for New Families of Distributions, Journal of Statistical Software. The families of distributions are: Marshall Olkin G distributions, exponentiated G distributions, beta G distributions, gamma G distributions, Kumaraswamy G distributions, generalized beta G distributions, beta extended G distributions, gamma G distributions, gamma uniform G distributions, beta exponential G distributions, Weibull G distributions, log gamma G I distributions, log gamma G II distributions, exponentiated generalized G distributions, exponentiated Kumaraswamy G distributions, geometric exponential Poisson G distributions, truncated-exponential skew-symmetric G distributions, modi???ed beta G distributions, and exponentiated exponential Poisson G distributions.
